Package Model

Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.Card
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Category1, Category2, Category3, Category4, Category5, Category6
    public abstract class Card
extends java.lang.Object
    This class denotes the Card object of the game, this also contains all the commands of the card chosen. The Card object contains a name, rowIndex (to denote category) and columnIndex (to denote which card it is in a certain category).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Card​(java.lang.String name)
      This will initialize a Card with a given name, rowIndex and columnIndex

    • Method Detail

      • applyEffect

        public abstract void applyEffect​(Player player,
                                 Board b,
                                 int loc,
                                 Bank bank)
        Applies effect of the chosen card to the player. This contains 18 possible commands.
        Parameters:
        player - : player who drew the card from deck
        b - : board used in the game
        loc - : current location of the player
        bank - : bank in the game which stores and collects money from players

      • getName

        This method returns the name of the card

      • nearest

        public int nearest​(java.lang.String type,
                   Board b,
                   int loc)
        Returns the indexof the nearest space type specified with given current location in the board
        Parameters:
        type - : the space type that the player will go to, whichever is nearest
        b - : board to be used in the game
        loc - :current location of the player
        Returns:
        index to nearest Space of given type
